title: QR Code-Based Collaborative Learning Material Development and Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy (Understanding of Smartphone Basic Functions)
context.additional_context: Social domain job-linked education for professional groups (medical/legal/technical), with smartphone-centric limited-technology access in PC-unavailable settings.

learning_goals: Learners can access collaborative learning materials by scanning QR codes.
Learners enhance knowledge-sharing skills with peers through QR code-based discussion assignments.
Learners can establish and execute self-directed learning plans in blended learning environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
